attributes.additional_details:
How about a petition for the failings of the above body.
The GMC.
How can they state this is a well recorgnised condition when five of thier so called consultants could not recorgnise it for over three weeks.
And the health trust concerned paid out a five figure sum for negliegence,which was not their fault,only a difficent doctor in their employ.
The GMC stated it is well recorgnised and hind sight is a wonderfull thing.
Again proving what another load of rubbish we seem to accept off them.
If you or your partner or your family receive poor treatment,contact us and we will try to help.
The government want`s to get a grip with what is happening in the NHS before it is too late.
We have contacted you before and have been ignored over the last six years.
Why truth to close to home.
L Wyles.
